data.title: Public Transport
data.text:
Bern Airport can be conveniently reached by public transport. The journey time from Berne main railway station via Belp to the airport is around 35 minutes.

Visitors and passengers traveling by train should travel to the airport by rail to either Belp or Rubigen railway stations. Belp and Rubigen railway stations can be reached with these S-Bahn local and regional passenger train services:

S1 Fribourg - Rubigen - Thun

S3 Biel / Bienne - Belp

S4 Langnau i.E. - Belp - Thun

S31 Münchenbuchsee - Belp

S44 Sumiswald-Grünen - Belp - Thun

There is a bus connection with BERNMOBIL bus no. 160 for the last section of the journey from the Belp and Rubigen railway stations to the airport.

Battery packs for electric bicycles can be recharged at the Welcome Desk in the Terminal Building.

There is a taxi rank in front of the Terminal Building. If no taxis are present please contact the airport ground staff to order a taxi.
